thread.title: Mother finds pictures of man’s genitals on her new mobile phone
thread.title_full: Mother finds pictures of man’s genitals on her new mobile phone

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Mother finds pictures of man’s genitals on her new mobile phone
text:
Richard Hartley-Parkinson for Metro.co.uk Thursday 2 Feb 2017 11:50 am Lynn Conlin found phone on her mobile phone (Picture: SWNS) 
A mother has described getting the shock of her life when she found pictures of a man’s genitals on her new phone. 
Lynn Conlin, 46, bought the phone just after Christmas and asked her husband and daughter to get it working for her. Britain has 3,000 ways to say 'drunk' (here's 100 of them) 
But once they signed in to her Apple account and the iCloud, 12 images appeared on the iPhone 5S. 
Six of them were blank but the remaining half dozen were the same obscene picture of a man’s nether regions which left Lynn thoroughly disgusted. (Picture: SWNS) 
Lynn, who also has a nine-year-old son, said: ‘I couldn’t understand what had happened, neither of us could. 
‘It is a brand new phone, not a refurbished one or anything, so they couldn’t have been left there from a previous owner. School plans to open later because pupils can't get out of bed in time 
‘I took the phone straight back to the shop to complain and the manager took a copy of the images, but couldn’t give me any explanation as to why the pictures were on the phone. 
‘They said they would get back in touch with me to let me know what happened but I haven’t heard anything three weeks on. (Picture: SWNS) 
‘I am quite angry about this. I could have bought this phone for one of my kids who could have seen this. It’s disgusting.’ 
Apple was contacted for a response to the complaint, but the company say they do not comment on individual customer cases. Couple fined for maliciously ordering takeaways for a neighbour 
Lynn, from Carronshore, Falkirk, purchased the phone at a branch of network Three on Falkirk High Street. 
A Three spokesperson said: ‘In order to assess how this has happened we need to test the device thoroughly. 
‘We have offered the customer a replacement handset and discount on their line rental as an intermediate gesture while we investigate this serious matter further.’ More
